elements.text: While reading at home, you notice you are having trouble focusing on the words and remembering the information. This causes you to feel concerned and makes it even harder to read. You decide to bring this problem up to your doctor, and (after making a plan) you feel...

elements.name: Trouble Reading_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
